graph.topic: Advertising - positive or negative part of our lives

nodes.text: more good comes from advertising than bad
the idea that advertising is a positive part of life can be more supported
both of the views have strong support
advertising is carried out with the main purpose of promoting different products and services or encouraging people to consume more
Advertisements are, therefore, very important for many businesses to increase sales and hence profits
to consumers, advertising can bring them many benefits
they can compare them and then have a better decision in choosing their internet or mobile phone plans
a huge amount of different advertisements could be sent automatically by a system to personal phones or email addresses
this is generally known as spam, and causes discomfort or even annoyance to many people
advertising can be very expensive and not every advertising campaign can be done successfully and brings good results
some people have argued against advertising due to its negative impacts
advertising is believed by many, a financial burden to businesses
advertising has brought great benefits to lives
it should be considered a positive activity
customers of telecommunication services will have an idea about the current offers of different companies
it is easy to see why the idea that advertising is a positive part of life will garner strong support
